preference.name: initialCenter
preference.label: Initial Location
preference.description: Decimal coordinates where map will be centered on load (e.g. `52, 5`). Leave this setting empty if you don't want to center the map at init. Remember to change the initial zoom level if you provide an initial location.

preference.name: initialZoom
preference.label: Initial Zoom Level
preference.description: Initial zoom level. From 1 to 22, where '1' represents the furthest level and '22' the maximum zoom level.

preference.name: navigationControl
preference.label: Use NavigationControl
preference.description: Mark this option to use the Navigation Control

preference.name: scaleControl
preference.label: Use ScaleControl
preference.description: Mark this option to use the Scale Control

preference.name: geolocateControl
preference.label: Use GeolocateControl
preference.description: Mark this option to use the Geolocate Control

preference.name: attributionControl
preference.label: Compact Attribution Control
preference.description: Mark this option to use the compact Attribution Control

inputendpoint.name: layerInfo
inputendpoint.label: Layer Info
inputendpoint.description: Add or remove layers to the map, in addition to changing its base layer.

inputendpoint.name: poiInput
inputendpoint.label: Insert/Update PoIs
inputendpoint.description: Insert or update a Point of Interest.

inputendpoint.name: poiInputCenter
inputendpoint.label: Center PoIs
inputendpoint.description: Insert or update a Point of Interest and center the map on it.

inputendpoint.name: replacePoIs
inputendpoint.label: Replace PoIs
inputendpoint.description: Replace all the rendered PoIs by the ones provided in the event.

inputendpoint.name: deletePoiInput
inputendpoint.label: Delete PoIs
inputendpoint.description: Removes one or more point of interests from the map.

outputendpoint.name: poiOutput
outputendpoint.label: PoI selected
outputendpoint.description: A PoI has been selected on the map
